depth.name: Depth
depth.desc: A "deep" question challenges the core reasoning or assumptions in the argument.

reasoning.name: Reasoning Quality
reasoning.desc: A high-quality question is logically coherent, and avoids misrepresenting the argument or using fallacies.

relevance.name: Relevance
relevance.desc: A "relevant" question stays focused on the original argument and does not bring in unrelated ideas.

specificity.name: Specificity
specificity.desc: A "specific" question is clearly tailored to the given argument, not so general that it could apply to any argument.
